DOC.brief_title: Stroke Team Remote Evaluation Using Digital Observation Camera- Long Term Outcomes ( STRokE DOC-LTO )
DOC.detailed_description: SPECIFIC AIM : The specific aim study evaluate long term outcomes patient previously enrol STRokE DOC ( `` STRokE DOC Trial ( NCT00283868 ) '' ) telemedicine clinical trial . AIM 1 : Aim 1 non- randomize , retrospective , data collection study assess long term patient outcomes patient previously enrol telemedicine vs. telephone clinical trial ( STRokE DOC Trial ( `` STRokE DOC Trial ( NCT00283868 ) '' ) ; complete ) . STRokE DOC-LTO evaluate , ( patient previously enrol original telemedicine vs. telephone clinical research trial ) , long term patient outcome ; compare telemedicine versus telephone-only consultation . Specific Protocol Information : The protocol contact patient telephone . One 5 Stroke Center team member contact patient , use strict telephone script language ( approve IRB ) ask question regard 1. current functional status 2. death 3 . Hemorrhage 4 . Recurrent Stroke 5 . Disposition 3 time period ( 6 month index event , 12 month index event , `` current '' time contact .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria : 1 . Male female subject , age > 18 year . 2 . Prior enrollment STRokE DOC ( `` STRokE DOC Trial ( NCT00283868 ) '' ) clinical research trial . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Male female subject , age < 18 year . 2 . Patients previously enrol STRokE DOC ( `` STRokE DOC Trial ( NCT00283868 ) '' ) clinical research trial .
